text: rome is a condition that affects development before birth, particularly of structures in the face and neck. Its characteristic features include skin anomalies on the neck, malformations of the eyes and ears, and distinctive facial features.  ""Branchio-"" refers to the branchial arches, which are structures in the developing embryo that give rise to tissues in the face and neck.
